title: Qasemabad, Tafresh
text: Qasemabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Qāsemābād) is a village in <a href="Kuh%20Panah%20Rural%20District">Kuh Panah Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Tafresh%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Tafresh%20County">Tafresh County</a>, <a href="Markazi%20Province">Markazi Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 74, in 25 families.
